name: INAppendToNoteIntentHandling
desc: The handler interface for appending content to a note.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: func resolveContent(for: INAppendToNoteIntent, with: (INNoteContentResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the content to append to the note.

items.name: func resolveTargetNote(for: INAppendToNoteIntent, with: (INNoteResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the note that receives the new content.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INAppendToNoteIntent, completion: (INAppendToNoteIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms whether you can append content to the note.

items.name: func handle(intent: INAppendToNoteIntent, completion: (INAppendToNoteIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Handles appending content to a note.
